original_text: When people ask you for something, you should give it to them. If they ask you to lend them something, then you should not refuse.
korean_text: 네게 구하는 자에게 주며 네게 꾸고자 하는 자에게 거절하지 말라

sentences.original_text: When people ask you for something
you should give it to them
If they ask you to lend them something
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 당신에게 무언가를 빌려달라고 요청하면
